task.summary: Initial (and very rough) Alarm manager impl

MESSAGE.value: Attempting a move to IDEA, added IDEA config, move target API to 15
start task run by clicking on it; add some status color stuff
Add types, add spinner with custom adapter for types.
save probe type

finally decided on how the scheduler will look. Tried overriding system prefs api, but stackoverflow indicates it's a bad idea, so I'm writing a pref-life View tag for the scheduler page (rather than have a monstrous unmaintainable page)
adjusted naming convention, moved onclick definition to subclass, and fixed onclick for boolean pref view
improve error handling
building of idText in the initViewCommon method while valid code, causes Intellij's very useful preview pane to stop working for custom views. Don't really need to call it there, so out it goes.
add spinner from enum support
sub dialog for 'repetition' added, among other stuff
date and time picker stubs added
Stub for days added, this probably also not ideal
in the interest of finishing some time this decade I'm keeping the scheduler very simple for now, removed 'active hours' till I can find a nice two-thumb range slider solution.

After doing initial attempt with ORMlite I've decided to stick with plain SQL for now (thought ORMlite integration is on the cards). Separated DB setup and 'business logic' into Helper and DAOs (although the DAOs are simply subclasses). This is likely to change with ORM integration. Standardised on the use of 'Schedule' in naming
minor style cleanup
lots of random fixes, initial work on actually scheduling an item
start date impl
repetition dialog impl
coarse saving of schedule config added
Initial (and very rough) Alarm manager impl
fix extras data
